name: active_app_area
objective: top bar has an active application area
description:
The Application area is located between the Application button and the center of the top bar
It must display the icon and the name of the active application (the one with focus).
The current application menu is displayed when clicking (left mouse button) in this area.

steps.expected: its icon must appear in the "active application area", on the right of the Applications button

name: clock
description:
A clock (Date and time) must be located in the middle of the top bar.
A click on the clock displays opens a menu with the following items:
- a calendar 
- a shortcut to Date&Time settings
- a shortcut to calendar application

steps.description: observe the center of the top bar
steps.expected: the clock must be displayed with the right datetime

steps.description: a click on the clock must display a menu
steps.expected: a popup menu is displayed
the menu must contain a calendar on the left with current day hightlighted
the menu must contain 3 shortcuts ("Open Calendar","Open clocks","Date & Time settings") at the bottom
the right side must contain the reminders for the current day and the next day

name: user_menu
objective: top bar has a user menu button
description:
The user menu button must be located at the right of the top bar.
A left click on the button should open the user menu, containing the following shortcuts:
- notification (switch)
- user settings
- switch user
- log out
- lock
- power off

steps.description: observe the right side of the topbar
steps.expected: a user menu button must be displayed
the login name is correct
an icon must appear, representing user visibility (online, offline, away ...)
a pop up menu must appear
must contain the user photo (avatar)
must display the login name
must contain the user status (online, offline ...)
must contain a notification switch
must contain the "Settings" item
must contain the "Switch user" item
must contain the "Log out" item
must contain the "Power off" item
